title: Don't miss out on the latest Advisory Board insights
description: FDA authorizes a rapid, hand-held coronavirus test; the Covid-19 Prevention Network launches a website allowing people to volunteer for clinical trials on potential coronavirus vaccines, and more.
cleaned_text: Create your free account to access 2 resources each month, including the latest research and webinars. You have 2 free members-only resources remaining this month remaining this month. Never miss out on the latest innovative health care content tailored to you.
